text: So many of you guys have solved exercise 5 In today's video, I will tell you the solution of exercise 5 Then I will give a shoutout to all of you who have solved this question Like with high energy and write Sigma patch up in the comment section below Let's go to the computer screen Let's roll the intro Intro So guys here I have made a folder named video 41 And the first thing I will do is open it in VS code And I will tell you how we can design this layout So I will name it layout And this is going to be the solution of our exercise For you guys, I will toggle the word wrap and screencast mode So that you can see what keys I am pressing Now you see carefully here that we have to make this layout And we can also use these colors So the first thing I will do is make a navbar I will say that there will be a header in my body And there will be a footer in my body There will be a main content and a footer I am using HTML semantic tags And there will be a navbar in my header And the navbar Now see here I will not use flexbox Because when I gave you this exercise, I did not tell you about flexbox But I tell you guys here That how we will do it by pinking the background color And we will make its height 133 pixels And I am going to do one more thing here And that is that I have already told you that You go to settings and go to the live preview extension This is the live preview extension I don't want to open it in the new tab here I want to open it in the external browser So whenever I click here, I will open it directly in the external browser I will do one more thing here First of all, I will make it 83 pixels And by putting a universal selector I will make it M0 and P0 What will happen with this? Margin will be 0, padding will be 0 And the spacing that was visible will not be visible So here you guys saw that I made the pink color layout After this, what I will do below is I will make a container And I will give padding in that container I will make a container in my main content So div.container I will write here Now what I will do inside this container Inside the dot container I will give a background color red Now you will say who gives red background color? I just give it for testing And I will remove it And what I will do here is I will do margin From top bottom, say 12 pixels And from left right, 34 pixels So you see here that it did not come I see what is the problem Div.container will take So its height is not of container So I will make its height 233 pixels And you can see here I have given a little more than left right And from top bottom, something like this What is the idea? The idea is to make this layout green I don't give it green By the way, why didn't I give green? I should have given it green So I make its background green And you see now it looks like this And there are two boxes inside it One box is of my pink color And one box is of my blue color So I will write here div.box1 And along with that I will also make a box2 So this one is of pink color box1 And I will give css to this box1 And I will remove its height Of container because it is going to be automatic So there is a box1 and a box2 So what I will do in my box1 That the color of this box1 will be pink So background color pink Okay, let's take this pink And along with that let's make it blue Let's make the background color blue And the obvious thing is that I will see it in the new tab Sorry, I will see it in the new line And I will have to do something about it So now if you see here So I have also removed its height So I give height to box1 and box2 And I will give height to it Say 240 or I will do one thing I will give it a height of 70vh Okay, 70vh And I will also give it a height of 70vh to box2 So there can be many ways to make this layout If I tell you the truth And I will make its width I will make its width 50% So we will make the width 50% And as soon as we make the width 50% Now see here, this came This is my container There is a box1 and a box2 in the container And the width of box1 is 50% Height is 70vh Now you know what the problem is here The problem is that these two came inside it That is, the pink box and this So what do I have to do to bring it in the same line There is one way to bring it in the same line That I make both the boxes inline But this is not a good practice Okay, let me tell you I am trying to avoid just flexbox I could have used float and clear In fact, I will block it inline So that it obeys the width And now you see how it looks It looks like this And it looks like this because of margin padding I have to reduce its width a little So I make it 45-45 Instead of 50-50 I make it 45-45 And you see it looks like this And I have to give padding in it So I do one thing I give padding in both And I will write here padding Top bottom says 0 And sorry not padding I had to give margin Margin of the spacing around them And you see It looks like this It looks like this, it doesn't look like this Now I can increase this margin So that it pulls more here So I can set it from here And what will I do to set it Simply I will come here in box 2, I will come in box 1 In fact I can give padding in container This is also an option This is also an option that I say That give padding in container Such that it looks like this And to center it I will give text align center in container What will happen with this That it will come in the center As you can see it has come in the center I just have to do one more thing That the margin I have given in the container That is fine I should also give padding in the container Which will be 0 pixels from top bottom And from left right Sorry, 23 pixels from top bottom And from left right I also background color What will I do I will do this I will do biscuit You see here my footer has come My footer has come And here I told you That you have to make a sticky And your navbar That should also Welcome to sigma Web development Express And after writing this what will I do The text box My text box I will give it I will give padding 34 pixels And after this I will give border 2 pixels Solid
